com.garmin.health.realtime

Interface RealTimeDataManager


  • public interface RealTimeDataManager
    RealTimeDataManger acts as an entry point for managing callbacks on real time data streamed by the Garmin Health SDK. For more information on available data types. Direct retrieval of this class from DeviceManager has been deprecated, and all the method available through this interface have been duplicated in DeviceManager for simplicity. Please note: Not all devices support all data types, please review GarminHealth SDK documentation for supported devices and data types.
    See Also:
    for a complete source set of available types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRealTimeDataListener(RealTimeDataListener listener, Set<RealTimeDataType> dataTypes)

    • Method Detail

      • addRealTimeDataListener

        void addRealTimeDataListener(RealTimeDataListener listener,
                             Set<RealTimeDataType> dataTypes)
        Adds a listener to be notified when new real time data is available. The provided listener will receive callbacks on all the data types provided. These callback can be for any paired Garmin device. Callbacks will not begin until real time data is enabled using the method RealTimeManager#enableRealTimeData(String, Set)
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be registered for callbacks.

      • removeRealTimeDataListener

        void removeRealTimeDataListener(RealTimeDataListener listener,
                                Set<RealTimeDataType> dataTypes)
        Removes a listener to be notified when new real time data is available. The provided listener will no longer receive callback from the types provided. To safely remove all types please provide EnumSet.allOf(RealTimeDataType.class) as the second parameter of this method. this method will remove callbacks for all paired Garmin devices.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be unregistered for callbacks.

      • enableRealTimeData

        void enableRealTimeData(String macAddress,
                        Set<RealTimeDataType> dataTypes)
        Enables real time notifications for device represented by macAddress provided, for the provided data types. Not all devices support all data types, please review GarminHealth SDK documentation for supported devices and data types. Real time data notifications will be provided as callbacks to registered RealTimeDataListener implementations.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - address for device that will enable real time notifications.
        dataTypes - set of dataTypes to be enabled.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if macAddress does not belong to a paired device.
        See Also:
        RealTimeDataListener#onDataUpdate(String, RealTimeDataType, RealTimeResult);

      • disableRealTimeData

        void disableRealTimeData(String macAddress,
                         Set<RealTimeDataType> dataTypes)
        Disables real time notifications for device represented by macAddress provided, for the provided data types.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - address for device that will disable real time notifications.
        dataTypes - set of dataTypes to be disabled.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if macAddress does not belong to a paired device.
